title: Peter Combe's Christmas under the stars
creator_credit: Impressa Visual Productions, ABC-TV (Australia) and Stephen Jones
brief_description: Entertainer, Peter Combe, celebrates the spirit of Christmas with this joyful family concert recorded live at the Adelaide Festival Centre in 1991. With the help of the Adelaide Girls’ Choir, Helen Beinke’s Dance Arts, Alice Combe on backing vocals and the Jingle Bells Band, Peter performs these songs - “Tell Me the Story”, “Rejoice, Rejoice”, “Christmas Child”, “Star Shines Bright”, “Hang Up Your Stocking”, “Ping”, “Baby Lying in a Manger”, “Christmas is Coming”, “Love & Joy”, “To You a Merry Christmas”, “Little Drummer Boy”, “Fear Not for I”, “O Little One”, “Silent Night”, “Mary’s Boy Child” and “Happy Christmas to You”.
